00036 MTKt_status MtkRegressionCoeffAllocate(
00037   int nline,   
00038   int nsample, 
00039   MTKt_RegressionCoeff *regressbuf 
00040 )
00041 {
00042   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00043   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status of called routines */
00044   MTKt_RegressionCoeff rbuf = MTKT_REGRESSION_COEFF_INIT;
00045                 /* Regression buffer structure */
00046   
00047   if (regressbuf == NULL)
00048     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00049 
00050   if (nline < 1)
00051     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00052 
00053   if (nsample < 1)
00054     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00055 
00056   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(nline, nsample, MTKe_uint8, &rbuf.valid_mask);
00057   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00058 
00059   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(nline, nsample, MTKe_float, &rbuf.slope);
00060   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00061 
00062   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(nline, nsample, MTKe_float, &rbuf.intercept);
00063   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00064 
00065   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(nline, nsample, MTKe_float, &rbuf.correlation);
00066   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00067 
00068   *regressbuf = rbuf;
00069 
00070   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00071 
00072 ERROR_HANDLE:
00073   MtkRegressionCoeffFree(&rbuf);
00074   return status_code;
00075 }
